DefaultEvent.Description: See what remains. You've won no favour with the Khanate here today - take whatever you can.
DefaultEvent.Name: What's in the hold?

ChildBranches.Name: Seize and loot her!
ChildBranches.Description: Take what you can. Imprison or cut down any Khaganians that remain.

DefaultEvent.Description: Your opponents are not delighted with the outcome. Their ship may lie beyond repair - perhaps they'll have to take to the boats. But the surviving officers shake your hand grudgingly, and wish you well.
DefaultEvent.Name: Surprise and confusion

ChildBranches.Name: Let her go
ChildBranches.Description: ...if you're desperate not to antagonise the Khanate. This is a privateer which attacked you, or a rogue naval vessel - you're within your rights - but mercy will repair your reputation, if the Khanate dislikes you already.

DefaultEvent.Description: Tactics, manoeuvres, weapons. So similar, and yet so different. You can learn from this.
DefaultEvent.Name: A bounty of experience!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Tactics, manoeuvres, weapons... and a few items of particular interest to the Admiralty.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A bounty of intelligence!

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered enough, you may learn something...

SuccessEvent.Description: When you next return to London, return to your Lodgings to claim your prize money...
SuccessEvent.Name: Awaiting your pleasure

DefaultEvent.Description: Your prize is never seen again. Perhaps a heptycheer devours your crew. Perhaps they devour each other. Perhaps they betray you and sail it to the Iron Republic, where laws cannot follow.
DefaultEvent.Name: Into the darkness

ChildBranches.Name: Send home with a prize crew
ChildBranches.Description: Eight zailors should be enough for a skeleton crew, unless she runs into trouble.

Description: Shattered, listing. Seize what you can.
Name: You've defeated a War Trimaran
